1000 0000      [0] ->  0000 0001    ->  0000 0000
	
1000 0000      [1] ->  1000 0010    ->  0000 0000

1000 0000

1000 0000

0x78
i    bits       cand         o            
00   01111001   1111001      01111001    
01   01111001   1111001      0011110011111001    
02   01111001   1111001      000111100111110011111001
03   01111001   1111001      00001111001111100111110011111001
04   01111001   1111001      0000011110011111001111100111110011111001
05   01111001   1111001      000000111100111110011111001111100111110011111001
06   01111001   1111001      00000001111001111100111110011111001111100111110011111001
